alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:50PM CDT until July 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LIMESTONE AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 449 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Pulaski to near Lexington to near Walnut Grove, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Florence, Athens, Rogersville, Killen, Lexington, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Elkmont, Anderson and Good Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
